BR_text.BRsummary: "rollup not found" when building docker image in github action
BR_text.BRdescription:
The package.json script should probably use  to make sure it is using the dev dependency. However, the  command should not even be run on postinstall as the build files are committed and certainly don't need to be rebuilt on installation. (This came up in a conversation with <denchmark-link:https://github.com/umesh-timalsina>@umesh-timalsina</denchmark-link>
  awhile back but I forgot to update it before merging.)
 Here is the complete error log:
 <denchmark-code>> ***@2.4.1 build-svelte /***
 > rollup -c utils/svelte/rollup.config.js
 
 sh: 1: rollup: not found
 npm ERR! code ELIFECYCLE
 npm ERR! syscall spawn
 npm ERR! file sh
 npm ERR! errno ENOENT
 npm ERR! ***@2.4.1 build-svelte: `rollup -c utils/svelte/rollup.config.js`
 npm ERR! spawn ENOENT
 npm ERR! 
 npm ERR! Failed at the ***@2.4.1 build-svelte script.
 npm ERR! This is probably not a problem with npm. There is likely additional logging output above.
 </denchmark-code>
